snippet: As the season begins, the Giants are counting on the eighth-year veteran Corey Webster to lead Michael Coe and other inexperienced cornerbacks against the Cowboys.
abstract: New York Giants are counting on the eighth-year veteran Corey Webster to lead Michael Coe and other inexperienced cornerbacks against the Dallas Cowboys in the season opener.
lead_paragraph: As the season begins, the Giants are counting on the eighth-year veteran Corey Webster to lead Michael Coe and other inexperienced cornerbacks against the Cowboys.

headline.seo: At Cornerback, Giants Rely on Webster and Followers
headline.main: For the Giants, a Leader and Some Fresh Followers
headline.print_headline: For the Giants, a Leader And Some Fresh Followers
